extension.name: Website Header - Gantry Particle (Hydrogen)
extension.author: Andreas Kar
extension.description:
Website Header - Particle for Gantry Framework

 Andreas Kar (andreas.kar@gmx.at)

NOTE: This particle is installed for the Gantry Hydrogen.
If you want to install the particle on a different Gantry template, you must manually copy the two files website-header.yaml and website-header.html.twig to /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/particles.
